alert.note: Alert for Goose Creek and Raft River Valley, Southern Sawtooth NF, Twin Falls BLM south of the Snake River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 08 at 9:05PM MDT until July 09 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 427... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 427... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 427 Goose Creek and Raft River Valley/Southern Sawtooth NF/Twin Falls BLM south of the Snake River. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph between noon and 9 pm Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Should a fire get established, rapid fire spread rates could occur.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly based on these criteria for Southeastern Idaho: - Relative humidity at or below 15 percent and wind gusts of at least 25 mph in the mountains, or 30 mph in the Snake Plain.

area.areaDesc: Goose Creek and Raft River Valley, Southern Sawtooth NF, Twin Falls BLM south of the Snake River
